introduce.title: What is Digital Heirloom
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: Digital Heirloom is a NextJS boilerplate for building AI SaaS startups, including templates, components, and documentation.

items.title: Ready-to-use Templates
items.description: Choose from dozens of production-ready AI SaaS templates to quickly start your project.

items.title: Infrastructure Setup
items.description: Get instant access to scalable infrastructure with best practices built-in.

items.title: Quick Deployment
items.description: Deploy your AI SaaS application to production in hours, not days.

items.title: AI Integration
items.description: Integrate AI into your project with ease using our built-in AI SDK.

benefits.title: Why Choose Digital Heirloom
benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.description: Get everything you need to launch your AI startup - from ready-to-use templates to technical support.

items.title: Complete Framework
items.description: Built on Next.js with authentication, payments, and AI integration - everything works out of the box.

zero-knowledge-security.title: Privacy-First Security
zero-knowledge-security.description: Your API credentials are encrypted with AES-256 before storage. We use read-only access to your platforms, ensuring your data is never compromised and we can never modify your settings.

about.title: Built for the Army of One
about.label: About Us
about.description: SoloBoard was born out of a simple frustration: Managing 10 SaaS products shouldn't feel like a chore.
about.story: As a serial entrepreneur, I found myself wasting hours every week manually checking different admin panels. I realized that as my portfolio grew, my focus vanished. I didn't need more complex analytics; I needed a Pulse Monitor.
about.mission: SoloBoard is our answer to the chaos. Built on top of robust technologies like Neon and ShipAny, we provide independent founders with the clarity they need to scale. We aren't just a dashboard; we are your digital command center, helping you spend less time monitoring and more time building.

values.title: Founder-First Design
values.description: Every feature is designed with the solopreneur's workflow in mind. No bloat, no complexity‚Äîjust what you need.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: We build in public. Follow our journey on Twitter/X and see how we're constantly improving based on real user feedback.

values.title: Security by Default
values.description: Your data security isn't an afterthought‚Äîit's our foundation. AES-256 encryption and read-only access ensure your business stays safe.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about SoloBoard
faq.tip: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our customer support team

items.question: How does SoloBoard connect to my websites?
items.answer: We use secure API connections (OAuth and API Keys) to fetch data from providers like Google Analytics 4, Stripe, and Shopify. It takes less than 2 minutes to sync a new site.

items.question: Is it safe to share my API keys?
items.answer: Yes. We prioritize security above all else. All keys are encrypted using AES-256 and stored in a secure Neon database. We only request Read-Only permissions, so your funds and configurations are never at risk.

items.question: Does SoloBoard slow down my website's performance?
items.answer: Not at all. SoloBoard communicates directly with the platform APIs (like Stripe's servers). We do not load any scripts on your actual website, ensuring your page speed remains 100% unaffected.

items.question: Can I manage more than 10 websites?
items.answer: Absolutely. While our standard Pro plan covers up to 10 sites, our Studio plan offers unlimited monitoring for larger portfolios and agencies.

items.question: Why choose SoloBoard over free alternatives?
items.answer: While you can check these platforms individually for free, SoloBoard saves you the most valuable asset you have: Time. We consolidate everything into a high-performance, mobile-ready dashboard that a single browser tab simply can't match.

items.question: What platforms do you support?
items.answer: We currently support Google Analytics 4 (GA4) for traffic analytics, Stripe and Lemon Squeezy for payment processing, Shopify for e-commerce, and custom uptime monitoring. More integrations are added regularly based on user requests.

items.question: How often does the data refresh?
items.answer: Free plan users get hourly updates. Pro plan users enjoy near real-time synchronization (every 5-10 minutes) to ensure you never miss critical changes in your business metrics.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely. You can cancel your subscription with one click through your billing portal. No hidden fees, no dark patterns, no questions asked.

items.title: Core Technology: Next.js 16 & Neon PostgreSQL
items.description: SoloBoard is built on Next.js 16 with React 19, providing lightning-fast performance and seamless user experience. Data is stored in Neon's serverless PostgreSQL database with automatic scaling and 99.99% uptime guarantee.

items.title: Platform Integrations: GA4, Stripe, Shopify & More
items.description: We support the most popular platforms for solopreneurs: Google Analytics 4 for traffic tracking, Stripe and Lemon Squeezy for payment processing, Shopify for e-commerce, and custom API endpoints for any other service you use.

items.title: Why Upgrade to Pro Plan?
items.description: For users managing multiple high-traffic sites, the Pro Plan offers real-time data synchronization (every few minutes), AI-powered business insights, unlimited sites, custom alerts, and priority support. Perfect for serial entrepreneurs and agency owners.

items.title: Data Privacy & Compliance
items.description: SoloBoard is GDPR and CCPA compliant. We use read-only API access and AES-256 encryption for all credentials. Your data is never shared with third parties, and you can export or delete it at any time. We are SOC 2 Type II certified.
